title: NHM Alappuzha Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 03 Entomologist and Other Posts
description: National Health Mission Alappuzha (NHM Alappuzha) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Entomologists, support Staff Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the NHM Alappuzha Recruitment 2025 . Here we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and hw to apply for these posts.
